Reminds me of people who come from the ghetto.
translation.it: Mi ricorda della gente che viene dal ghetto.

translation.en: Sometimes I envy them.
You don't know anything.
Oh, no? The clock is good for no one.
translation.it: Oh, no? Questo timer è un male per chiunque.

translation.en: The poor die and the rich don't live.
translation.it: I poveri muoiono e i ricchi non vivono.

translation.en: We can all live forever as long as we don't do anything foolish.
translation.it: Possiamo vivere tutti per sempre fin tanto che non facciamo qualcosa di stupido.

translation.en: Doesn't that scare you? That maybe you'll never do anything foolish?
translation.it: Non ti spaventa? Che forse non farai mai niente di stupido?

translation.en: Or courageous or anything worth a damn?
translation.it: O coraggioso o niente che valga niente?

translation.en: Come with me.
This was tonight.
He's only an hour ahead of us.
translation.it: Ha solo un'ora di vantaggio su di noi.

translation.en: Look at that.
I've never seen anything like it.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto niente di simile.

translation.en: What are you doing?
We don't go in.
You're insane.
You have this in your backyard. You never go in.
translation.it: Hai questo dietro casa. Non entri mai in acqua.

translation.en: And I'm insane?
Well? What are you waiting for?
Sylvia, come on!
What happened to doing something foolish?
translation.it: Cosa è successo all'idea di fare qualcosa di stupido?

translation.en: I don't know you.
We could change that.
I get it.
You're out here, all alone,
with a stranger.
You can't be too careful.
translation.it: Non si può mai essere troppo prudenti.

translation.en: Maybe you can.
I have to go back.
To what?
You should go back.
Have you seen my daughter? I have.
She's with her guards.
Right behind you.
Thank God.
Now, how about that game?
translation.it: E ora, che ne dice di quella partita?

translation.en: It's all right, everyone. What's this about?
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Di cosa si tratta?

translation.en: I'm sorry to have to break up the party, Mr. Weis.
translation.it: Mi dispiace rovinare la sua festa, sig. Weis.

translation.en: I just need a word with your friend.
translation.it: Devo solo parlare con il suo amico.

translation.en: My friend?
Very well.
I'm Timekeeper Raymond Leon.
translation.it: Sono il Guardiano del Tempo Raymond Leon.

translation.en: I'm Will Salas. I know.
translation.it: - Io sono Will Salas. - Lo so.

translation.en: What are you doing in this Zone?
translation.it: Cosa ci fa in questa zona temporale?

translation.en: It's not illegal, is it? To change Time Zones?
translation.it: Non è illegale, vero? Cambiare zona temporale.

translation.en: No, it's not illegal.
It's just rare.
Where did you get that? I won it.
translation.it: - Dove ha preso quello? - L'ho vinto.

translation.en: Gambling.
All of it?
A man named Henry Hamilton gave me over a century.
translation.it: Un uomo chiamato Henry Hamilton mi ha dato più di un secolo.

translation.en: He said he didn't need it anymore.
translation.it: Mi ha detto che non ne aveva più bisogno.

translation.en: He timed himself out.
Henry Hamilton was worth thousands of years.
He could practically live forever.
translation.it: Avrebbe potuto vivere praticamente in eterno.

translation.en: You expect me to believe that he was immortal and he wanted to die?
translation.it: Si aspetta che io creda che era immortale e che voleva morire?

translation.en: I don't expect you to believe it.
translation.it: Non mi aspetto che mi creda.

translation.en: But it's the truth.
It was a gift.
I'm not a thief.
But, hey, if you guys are looking for stolen time,
translation.it: Ma, ehi, se voi state cercando del tempo rubato,

translation.en: maybe you should arrest everyone here. Oh, I see.
translation.it: - dovreste arrestare tutti, qui. - Oh, capisco.

translation.en: You're talking about justice.
Well, I am a Timekeeper.
translation.it: Beh, sono un Guardiano del Tempo.

translation.en: I don't concern myself with "justice."
I only concern myself with what I can measure.
translation.it: Mi occupo solo di ciò che posso misurare:

translation.en: Seconds, minutes, hours.
I keep time.
And that time is in the wrong hands.
translation.it: E quel tempo è nelle mani sbagliate.

translation.en: That time will be held, along with you.
translation.it: Quel tempo sarà sotto chiave, con lei.

translation.en: We'll leave you two hours for booking and processing.
translation.it: Le lasceremo due ore per il fermo.

translation.en: Why are you investigating a suicide?
There's mass murder in the ghetto every day.
translation.it: C'è un omicidio di massa nel ghetto ogni giorno.

translation.en: That is fascinating.
I heard another man talk like that.
translation.it: Ho sentito un altro uomo parlare in questo modo.

translation.en: It was over 20 years ago.
You were probably too young to remember your father.
translation.it: Probabilmente lei era troppo giovane per ricordarsi di suo padre.

translation.en: We'll arrange safe transport.
translation.it: Ci occuperemo noi del suo trasporto.

translation.en: This is New Greenwich, after all.
translation.it: Questo è New Greenwich, dopo tutto.

translation.en: Sylvia? Do as I say and go with the guards.
translation.it: Sylvia? Fai come dico e vai con le guardie.

translation.en: Oh, for God's sake, Father. There's an army in this house.
translation.it: Per Dio, padre. C'è un esercito in questa casa.

translation.en: If we can't stop one man from killing us, we should kill ourselves.
translation.it: Se non possiamo fermare un uomo dall'ucciderci, dovremmo ucciderci noi.

translation.en: Stop him!
Move! Get out of the way!
Put it down or I'll blow her head off.
translation.it: Mettila giù o le faccio saltare la testa.

translation.en: Thanks.
You're going to kill us! Please just let me out!
translation.it: Ci farai ammazzare. Ti prego fammi scendere.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Do you even know how to drive?
What's there to know?
Oh, shit. (HORN HONKING)
Give me some time.
I guess you really are from the ghetto, after all.
translation.it: Immagino tu sia davvero del ghetto.

translation.en: What the hell do you know about where I'm from? Give me some time.
translation.it: Cosa ne sai tu del posto da dove vengo? Dammi un po' di tempo.

translation.en: Or you're gonna kill me, like you killed Henry Hamilton?
translation.it: Mi ucciderai, come hai ucciso Henry Hamilton?

translation.en: Lend me an hour.
I'm not giving you a second.
translation.it: Non ti darò nemmeno un secondo.

translation.en: I should have listened to my father.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto dare ascolto a mio padre.

translation.en: Please, take me home. Please.
translation.it: Ti prego, portami a casa. Ti prego.

translation.en: I can't do that. Why?
You're keeping me alive.
translation.it: Tu mi stai tenendo in vita.

translation.en: Keep that covered.
Anybody sees it, you're definitely dead.
translation.it: Se qualcuno lo vede, sarai certamente morta.

translation.en: Now that worked too well.
You guys wasted a gorgeous car.
Look who it is. Who it was.
translation.it: - Guarda di chi si tratta. - Di chi si trattava.

translation.en: He's done in minutes.
He'll wake up dead. That'll be a shock.
translation.it: Si sveglierà morto. Sarà un vero shock.

translation.en: Too bad. I would have preferred to kill him more beautifully.
translation.it: Peccato. Mi sarebbe piaciuto ucciderlo più platealmente.

translation.en: The girl's still breathing.
She's got a decade.
Holy shit.
The man he stole from me had more than a century.
translation.it: L'uomo che ha rubato a me aveva più di un secolo.

translation.en: What? We'll divide it later.
It's like an angel fell from the sky.
translation.it: È come se un angelo fosse caduto dal cielo.

translation.en: Fortis! Leave it!
Look at me. You okay?
Why are you laughing?
We're not dead. Yeah, we're not alive for long, either.
translation.it: - Non siamo morti. - Sì, ma non saremo nemmeno vivi a lungo.

translation.en: Where did my time go? I have a half hour!
translation.it: Dov'è finito il mio tempo? Ho solo mezz'ora.

translation.en: You're lucky.
Minutemen. Does everyone in the ghetto steal?
That's rich, coming from you.
translation.it: Che ironia, sentirlo dire a te.

translation.en: Please help me, Will. Let me guess,
translation.it: - Ti prego aiutami Will. - Fammi indovinare.

translation.en: now you like the idea of sharing.
Come here.
Hey, don't worry. It's not the first time I've been this broke.
translation.it: Ehi, non ti preoccupare. Non è la prima volta che sono così al verde.

translation.en: Well, it's a first for me.
What are we going to do?
Whatever we have to. Come on, we got to go.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa dobbiamo. Su, è meglio andarcene da qui.

translation.en: Dispatch, wire me my per diem.
COMPUTER VOICE: Time transfer.
Cutting it close again, sir.
translation.it: Ci è andato di nuovo vicino, signore.

translation.en: Well, I'm still walking around.
Judging by the lack of dead bodies, I have to assume they are also.
translation.it: A giudicare dall'assenza di cadaveri, direi che lo sono anche loro.

translation.en: They got jacked. They couldn't have left here with more than minutes.
translation.it: Sono stati rapinati. Non possono essersene andati con più di qualche minuto.

translation.en: He's back in his old neighborhood.
translation.it: È tornato al suo vecchio quartiere.

translation.en: So, where do you want us to start looking?
We don't. He'll come to us.
translation.it: Non lo faremo. Verrà lui da noi.

translation.en: Borel, open up. It's Will.
Where's Borel?
He's dead.
Dead? What?
You gave him a decade.
He drank himself to death with nine years on his clock.
translation.it: Si è ubriacato a morte con nove anni sul braccio.

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
Greta, I'm so sorry.
Goodbye, Will.
Will, we have minutes. Try not to act like it.
translation.it: - Will, abbiamo solo qualche minuto. - Cerca di stare tranquilla.

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean? Shut up!
We're going to die, Will! Do you want to die? Shut up!
I hope those are real. Run.
Stop! Wait! Please, wait!
translation.it: - Fermo! Aspetti! - Fermo. La prego, aspetti!

translation.en: MAN: Come back in an hour. That won't be possible.
translation.it: - Tornate tra un'ora. - Non è possibile.

translation.en: Here!
I'll give you two days for them. They're diamonds.
translation.it: - Vi darò due giorni per questi. - Sono diamanti.

translation.en: You can take the 48 hours, or you can be a pretty corpse.
translation.it: Potete prendere le 48 ore o puoi essere un bel cadavere.

translation.en: We'll take it.
translation.it: Potete prendere le 48 ore o puoi essere un bel cadavere. Le prendiamo.

translation.en: Don't make a sound.
Give me my time.
Let's go.
I guess I got my wish.
I did do something foolish.
Your name's on a lot of buildings.
translation.it: SOCIETÀ MUTUI TEMPORALI WEIS - Il tuo nome è su un sacco di palazzi. - È il nome di mio padre.

translation.en: It's my father's name.
translation.it: - Il tuo nome è su un sacco di palazzi. - È il nome di mio padre.

translation.en: How much is he worth, anyway?
Eons.
What do you think he'd pay to get you back?
translation.it: Cosa pensi che pagherebbe per riaverti indietro?

translation.en: You have no shame, do you?
COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one minute.
Dial.
Hello.
Mr. Weis, please give the phone to the Timekeeper.
translation.it: - Pronto. - Sig. Weis. La prego di passare il telefono al guardiano del tempo.

translation.en: Hello, Will. How much do you want?
A thousand years.
You'll never live to spend it.
translation.it: Non vivrai mai abbastanza per poterli spendere.

translation.en: Then distribute it to the Time Lines in Dayton.
translation.it: MISSIONE FUORI TEMPO Allora li distribuisca alle Linee del Tempo a Dayton.

translation.en: Do it by sunrise tomorrow and she can go home.
translation.it: Lo faccia entro l'alba e lei potrà tornare a casa.

translation.en: I'm afraid for you, Will.
You keep talking like him, you're going to die like him.
translation.it: Se continui a parlare come lui, finirai per morire come lui.

translation.en: My father died in a fight, trying to take a man's time.
translation.it: Ehi. Mio padre è morto in un incontro, cercando di prendere il tempo a un uomo.

translation.en: Oh, no. His crime wasn't taking time.
translation.it: Oh, no. Il suo crimine non è stato prendere il tempo.

translation.en: He was doing something far more dangerous.
translation.it: Stava facendo qualcosa di molto più pericoloso.

translation.en: Please don't make your father's mistake.
translation.it: Non commettere l'errore di tuo padre.

translation.en: I know it.
A thousand years to the Time Lines.
translation.it: Un migliaio d'anni alle Linee del Tempo.

translation.en: A thousand years.
It's nothing.
It's for our daughter.
No, it's for them.
This is insane.
They can take your time, just like that.
translation.it: Possono prendersi il tuo tempo, così, come niente.

translation.en: Or you can take theirs.
translation.it: O tu puoi prenderti il loro.

translation.en: This is insane.
Yeah, it's insane.
We should be safe here until dawn.
translation.it: Dovremmo essere al sicuro fino all'alba.

translation.en: I pay by the day. It'll take them a while to find me.
translation.it: Io pago giorno per giorno, gli ci vorrà un po' a trovarmi.

translation.en: This is your place?
There's water. It's cold, but it's something.
translation.it: C'è acqua. Fa freddo, ma è meglio di niente.

translation.en: You can put on fresh clothes.
Where's your family?
My mother timed out.
translation.it: Mia madre ha finito il tempo.

translation.en: This is her dress. Yeah.
What about your father?
He died when I was a boy.
He was a fighter. Strong arm.
He wasn't the strongest, but he knew how to win.
translation.it: Non era il più forte, ma sapeva come vincere.

translation.en: How do you win?
I'll show you.
What you do is let them have the upper hand.
translation.it: Gli lasci che vadano in vantaggio.

translation.en: Then, he'd let his time go all the way down.
translation.it: E poi, lasciava calare il suo tempo al minimo.

translation.en: Because he knew
that when you were down to your last seconds
translation.it: che quando hai solo qualche secondo

translation.en: and they think it's over,
translation.it: che quando hai solo qualche secondo e loro pensano che sia finita,

translation.en: they start watching your clock
and forget to watch their own.
translation.it: e dimenticano di guardare il loro.

translation.en: He died in a fight?
I think he was killed for giving away what he won.
translation.it: Credo che sia stato ucciso per aver donato quel che aveva vinto.

translation.en: He wasn't just giving them time.
translation.it: Non stava dando loro solo del tempo.

translation.en: He was giving them hope.
How long have you been this old?
Twenty-five for three.
Twenty-five for two.
What was it like when your clock started?
translation.it: Com'è stato quando è partito il timer?

translation.en: I was in the street. It almost knocked me over.
translation.it: Ero per la strada. Mi ha quasi fatto cadere.

translation.en: My year was gone in a week, we were so in debt.
translation.it: Eravamo così indebitati che il mio anno è finito in una settimana.

translation.en: After that, I lived day to day.
translation.it: Dopo quello, ho vissuto giorno per giorno.

translation.en: Mine was a little different.
It woke me.
I looked in the mirror.
I guess everybody does.
That's what you're gonna look like for the rest of your life.
translation.it: È questo l'aspetto che avrai per il resto della tua vita.

translation.en: My dad gave me a decade to celebrate.
translation.it: Mio padre mi diede un decennio per festeggiare.

translation.en: You must hate me.
Where I come from.
It's nobody's fault, what they're born with.
translation.it: Non è colpa di nessuno, ciò con cui si nasce.

translation.en: They open in a minute.
Let's see how generous your father is now.
translation.it: Vediamo quant'è generoso ora tuo padre.

translation.en: The Timekeepers would have never let him do it.
translation.it: I guardiani del tempo non gliel'avrebbero mai lasciato fare.

translation.en: You don't have to say that.
How do you think my father built all those buildings?
translation.it: Come credi che mio padre abbia costruito tutti quei palazzi?

translation.en: By giving away a thousand years?
Now what?
You can go home.
There's people on the streets. I can move without being spotted.
translation.it: C'è gente per strada. Posso muovermi senza farmi notare.

translation.en: What have you got?
Eleven hours.
How does anyone live like this? You don't generally sleep in.
translation.it: - Come si fa a vivere così? - Di solito non si dorme fino a tardi.

translation.en: You can call for help.
I'll watch from here, I'll make sure you're safe.
translation.it: Starò di guardia. Controllerò che tu sia al sicuro.

translation.en: You know, you could fight this.
translation.it: Starò di guardia. Controllerò che tu sia al sicuro. Sai, potresti combattere tutto questo.

translation.en: I can say that running to the ghetto was my idea.
translation.it: Potrei dire scappare nel ghetto è stata una mia idea.

translation.en: My father'd believe that, he thinks I'm reckless.
translation.it: Mi padre ci crederebbe, pensa che io sia incosciente.

translation.en: He has a lot of influence, Will. He can get you a lawyer.
translation.it: Ha molta influenza, Will. Può farti avere un avvocato.

translation.en: He can make a deal with those Timekeepers.
translation.it: Può fare un accordo con questi guardiani del tempo.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure that Timekeeper doesn't make deals.
translation.it: Sono quasi certo che i guardiani del tempo non facciano accordi.

translation.en: What are you going to do?
Steal?
Is it stealing if it's already stolen?
translation.it: CONDIVISIONE DEL TEMPO PRESTITI A BASSO COSTO È un furto se è già stato rubato?

translation.en: Here. Just in case.
I'll be right here.
COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one minute.
Father? Sylvia?
You couldn't spare a second, Father?
translation.it: Non potevi rinunciare nemmeno a un secondo?

translation.en: I wish I could say I'm surprised.
translation.it: Vorrei poter dire di essere sorpresa.

translation.en: Did you hear what I just said? You know I'd do anything for you.
translation.it: - Hai sentito che ho detto? - Lo sai che farei qualsiasi cosa per te.

translation.en: They're coming to get you. They know where you are.
translation.it: Stanno venendo a prenderti. Sanno dove sei.

translation.en: Will, look out!
Sorry to disappoint you, we don't keep much on us.
translation.it: Mi dispiace deluderti, ma non abbiamo molto con noi.

translation.en: To discourage thieves like you.
Think of this as a gift.
Will! Come on!
I didn't mean to shoot him. I wanted to scare him.
translation.it: Non volevo sparargli. - Volevo spaventarlo. - Credo tu abbia fatto entrambe le cose.

translation.en: I think you did both.
translation.it: - Volevo spaventarlo. - Credo tu abbia fatto entrambe le cose.

translation.en: You could say thank you. Thank you. What have you got?
translation.it: - Potresti ringraziarmi. - Grazie. Cosa ti è rimasto?

translation.en: Nine hours.
Why did you give him time? You should have taken it.
translation.it: Perché gli hai dato del tempo? Avresti dovuto prenderlo.

translation.en: Timekeepers live day to day.
translation.it: I guardiani del tempo vivono giorno per giorno.

translation.en: It'll be hours before the others show up.
translation.it: Passeranno ore prima che gli altri arrivino.

translation.en: He could die in the ghetto.
He still might.
Timekeeper, what's the hurry?
translation.it: - Guardiano, che fretta c'è? - Sì, che fretta c'è?

translation.en: Stay a while. You might like us if you got to know us!
translation.it: Rimani per un po'. Potremmo piacerti se imparassi a conoscerci.

translation.en: (ALL JEERING)
translation.it: Perché non rimani per un po'?

translation.en: They're going to think you're with me. Yes.
translation.it: - Penseranno che sei con me. - Sì.

translation.en: This is a mess.
Welcome to my world.
Back off!
You've been shot. I was worried you timed out.
translation.it: Ti hanno sparato. Ero preoccupato che avessi finito il tempo.

translation.en: Where'd you get that?
What are we going to do?
We can't keep driving around in this car. It's a cop car.
translation.it: Non possiamo continuare a guidare quest'auto. È l'auto della polizia.

translation.en: So let's make an arrest.
Was I going too fast?
Not fast enough.
The mistake you made was stopping.
translation.it: Il tuo errore è stato fermarti.

translation.en: Now, let's see who you got back there.
translation.it: Ora, vediamo chi hai là dietro.

translation.en: Got to be a year or two nobody's using.
translation.it: Ci dev'essere un anno o due che non sta usando nessuno.

translation.en: It went off.
I was just trying to help.
Come on.
Now, I'd say, "Your money or your life," but since your money is your life...
translation.it: Ora, dovrei dire: "I soldi o la vita"... ...ma dato che i tuoi soldi sono la tua vita...

translation.en: How dare you steal from me?
Don't think of it as stealing. No?
Think of it as repossession.
I'll leave you with what I've had most every day of my life.
translation.it: Ti lascerò con quello che ho avuto quasi ogni giorno della mia vita.

translation.en: One day. One day?
translation.it: Ti lascerò con quello che ho avuto quasi ogni giorno della mia vita. - Un giorno. - Un giorno?

translation.en: Are you insane?
You can do a lot in a day.
translation.it: Puoi fare molto in un giorno.

translation.en: Those are pretty.
I owe you these. You shouldn't have.
You, out.
FEMALE ANCHOR: Will Salas, prime suspect in the murder of Henry Hamilton,
translation.it: Will Salas, il principale sospetto nell'omicidio di Henry Hamilton,

translation.en: is believed to be traveling with Sylvia Weis,
daughter of finance magnate, Philippe Weis.
translation.it: la figlia del magnate della finanza, Philippe Weis.

translation.en: Citizens are advised to exercise extreme... (TURNS OFF TV)
translation.it: Siete invitati ad usare estrema caute--

translation.en: We look cute together.
It doesn't say you're wanted.
It doesn't say I'm not.
translation.it: Non dice che non lo sono.

translation.en: You've forgotten I shot a cop.
translation.it: Hai dimenticato che ho sparato a un poliziotto.

translation.en: I admit, not very well. (CHUCKLES)
It was your first time.
Hey.
I can say I made you do all of it.
translation.it: Posso dire che ti ho obbligata io a fare tutto.

translation.en: You can go back.
Go back to what?
Do I really want to spend my whole life trying not to die by mistake?
translation.it: Voglio davvero passare la vita a cercare di non morire per errore?

translation.en: A lot of people would say being here is a mistake.
translation.it: Un sacco di persone direbbero che trovarti qui è un errore.

translation.en: I don't have a choice.
I'm starting to think that I don't, either.
translation.it: Sto iniziando a pensare che non ce l'ho nemmeno io.

translation.en: I want to reassure you all there is no cause for alarm.
translation.it: Voglio rassicurarvi tutti che non c'è motivo di allarme.

translation.en: No ransom was paid.
translation.it: Non è stato pagato alcun riscatto.

translation.en: MAN: Your Zone is at risk, Philippe.
translation.it: La tua zona è a rischio, Philippe.

translation.en: WOMAN: It puts us at risk. It can spread.
translation.it: Mette tutti noi a rischio. Può diffondersi.

translation.en: Too much time in the wrong hands can crash the market.
translation.it: Troppo tempo nelle mani sbagliate può far crollare il mercato.

translation.en: This hostage situation will be quickly resolved.
translation.it: Questa situazione degli ostaggi verrà risolta presto.

translation.en: GUARD: Sir.
Everything is under control. We'll talk soon.
translation.it: È tutto sotto controllo. Parleremo presto.

translation.en: Timekeeper. After this regrettable incident,
it's really not necessary for you to come in person.
translation.it: non è necessario che lei venga di persona.

translation.en: I'm afraid it really is necessary.
When can we hope for a rescue?
translation.it: Quando possiamo sperare in un salvataggio?

translation.en: I believe that's the point.
She doesn't appear to want to be rescued.
Mr. Leon.
Raymond. May I call you Raymond?
I blame myself.
I invited the man into my home.
translation.it: Ho invitato quell'uomo nella mia dimora.

translation.en: He had so much time, how was I supposed to know?
translation.it: Aveva così tanto tempo, come potevo saperlo?

translation.en: Of course, Sylvia brought this on herself by her lack of vigilance.
translation.it: Certo, Sylvia, se l'è andata a cercare con la sua mancanza d'attenzione.

translation.en: That's why I always tried to keep her close.
translation.it: È per questo che ho sempre cercato di tenerla vicina a me.

translation.en: But she is clearly under Will Salas' control.

translation.en: I've issued a warrant for your daughter's arrest.

translation.en: If she contacts you and you assist her in any way,
translation.it: Se cercherà di contattarla e lei l'assisterà in qualsiasi modo,

translation.en: There is nothing I cannot buy.

translation.en: Now
how many of my years do you want?
There aren't enough years,
even in your lifetime, Mr. Weis. Good night.

translation.en: This is called a trigger.
And you don't pull it until you actually want to shoot something.

translation.en: I wanted to shoot something. Right.
Will, if you get a lot of time,
translation.it: Will, se riuscirai ad avere molto tempo,

translation.en: are you really gonna give it away?
I've only ever had a day.
translation.it: Ho sempre avuto solo un giorno.

translation.en: How much do you need?
How can you live with yourself watching people die right next to you?

translation.en: You don't watch.
You close your eyes.
I can help you get all the time you want.

translation.en: I need to borrow a month. What's the interest?
translation.it: Devo prendere in prestito un mese. Quali sono gli interessi?

translation.en: Today's rate, 30%.
I can't pay it back.
We can always come to some arrangement. (HORN HONKING)
Let's go.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am happy to announce that Weis Timelenders
translation.it: Signore e signori, sono felice di annunciare che la società Mutui Temporali Weis

translation.en: is now offering interest-free loans with no payments. Ever.
translation.it: adesso offre prestiti a interessi zero senza alcun pagamento.

translation.en: So help yourselves and take a day.
translation.it: - Mai. - Servitevi pure e prendete un giorno.

translation.en: Take a month. Hell, take a year. Come on. Help yourselves! Take it.
translation.it: Prendete un mese. Diamine, un anno. Andiamo. Servitevi pure! Prendetelo.

translation.en: Take the time. It's free.
No one's watching their clocks, huh?
translation.it: Nessuno guarda il proprio timer, ah?

translation.en: Get out of here, or I'll confiscate every second!
Must've thought it was a drive-through.
translation.it: Avranno pensato che era un drive-through.

translation.en: Turn around. Don't move.
I don't have much.
Everything I have, I give away. I know.
translation.it: - Tutto quello che ho, lo do via. - Lo so.

translation.en: Yes, sir, I do know that, sir.
There are years that shouldn't be there.
translation.it: Ci sono anni che non dovrebbero essere lì.

translation.en: I will stop him, sir.
Doesn't he understand he's hurting the very people he's trying to help?
translation.it: Non capisce che sta danneggiando proprio le persone che sta cercando di aiutare?

translation.en: Well, now.
Look at all that. Yeah.
I finally had time to buy one of these.
translation.it: Finalmente ho avuto il tempo per comprare una di queste.

translation.en: Let's not do anything I might regret.

translation.en: What was that about?
I wasted 30 days.
FEMALE ANCHOR: Today, Sylvia Weis withdrew some of her "inheritance"
translation.it: E oggi, Sylvia Weis ha prelevato parte della sua eredità,

translation.en: when she and Will Salas robbed her father's time bank
translation.it: quando lei e Will Salas hanno rapinato la banca del tempo di suo padre

translation.en: for the sixth time in a week.
translation.it: per la sesta volta in una settimana.

translation.en: I give her everything.
Does she want to kill me?
You were killing her, Philippe.
You were suffocating her.
You suffocate us all.
Call.
That's good.
Just not as good as that.
You haven't forgotten how to play cards.

translation.en: Why did I play strip poker with you?
translation.it: Perché ho accettato di giocare a strip poker con te?

translation.en: Why did you?
Sir.
They're still there.
How did you know, sir?
This is where the hours and the days are.
translation.it: È qui che sono le ore e i giorni.

translation.en: He's paid them all off.
This is where I would hide.
translation.it: Ed è qui che mi nasconderei io.

translation.en: Put your clothes on.
KORS: Stop!
We're trapped! No, we're not!
translation.it: - Siamo in trappola. - Non è vero.

translation.en: Jump. They won't do it. We shouldn't do it.
translation.it: - Salta. Non lo faranno. - Non dovremmo neanche noi.

translation.en: Come on!
See? They won't jump.
So much for your theory. Shit!
Here! Go!
Stop! Stop!
I'm telling you, he'll give up before we do! You sure about that?

translation.en: Go. I can't.
You can! Go!
Un-fucking-believable!
Hold on.
You two look familiar.
How about now?
Welcome to the Century.
Hi. We're looking for a quiet place to stay.
translation.it: Benvenuti al Century. Salve. Stiamo cercando un posto tranquillo dove stare.

translation.en: How many rooms?
All of them.
We were hoping for something long-term.
translation.it: Tutte. Speravamo in una cosa a lungo termine.

translation.en: Can we rely on the discretion of your staff?
translation.it: Speravamo in una cosa a lungo termine. Possiamo confidare nella discrezione del vostro staff?

translation.en: I'm sure you can.
I'm sorry. We're fully booked.
Right.
Nobody goes anywhere!
Wait, whoa, whoa.
MAN: Don't look at me.
You know who I'm looking for.
I'm looking for whoever gave this man a month!
translation.it: Sto cercando la persona che ha dato a quest'uomo un mese.

translation.en: And I'm gonna clean the clocks off of every one of you in this hellhole
translation.it: E ripulirò i timer di ognuno di voi in questa fogna

translation.en: until someone says something I want to hear.

translation.en: I can't hear anything.
Clean it.
No, wait, wait. Wait. Please!
translation.it: No, aspetta, aspetta, aspetta. Aspetta. Ti prego.

translation.en: Please don't. Please. I don't know where they are!
translation.it: Ti prego non farlo. Ti prego. Non so dove sono.

translation.en: Please.
Please!
Please.
I believe you're next.

translation.en: At last, someone's acting reasonably.
translation.it: Finalmente, qualcuno che si comporta ragionevolmente.

translation.en: I just want a share of the reward.
translation.it: Voglio solo una parte della ricompensa.

translation.en: My young friend.
You'll get your reward.
Ten years.
That's insulting.
If they catch us,
there's no way they won't kill us, is there?
translation.it: ...non c'è alcuna possibilità che non ci uccidano, vero?

translation.en: Do you regret this?
You saved my life.
When?
Now.
And every day since I met you.
translation.it: E ogni giorno da quando ti ho incontrato.

translation.en: You forget, I almost got you killed a few times, too.
translation.it: Ti sei dimenticata che ti ho quasi fatto ammazzare un paio di volte.

translation.en: I'm willing to overlook that.
translation.it: Beh, sono disposta a trascurare la cosa.

translation.en: How's the poor little rich girl?
translation.it: Come sta la povera ragazzina ricca?

translation.en: I never got a chance to
translation.it: Non ho mai avuto occasione di

translation.en: properly thank you for your time.
translation.it: ringraziarti a dovere per il tuo tempo.

translation.en: I'm not surprised you stayed.
translation.it: Non mi sorprende che tu sia rimasta.

translation.en: It's the life, isn't it?
Here we don't stop living
translation.it: Qui non smettiamo mai di vivere

translation.en: until we're actually dead.
translation.it: fino a quando non siamo davvero morti.

translation.en: There are a lot more ways to die around here.

translation.en: But here, there's dancing before dying.
translation.it: Ma qui, si balla prima di morire.

translation.en: Of course, it's your friend I'm most happy to run into again.
translation.it: Naturalmente è il tuo amico che sono davvero felice di rivedere.

translation.en: You've been causing a lot of trouble, which is normally my job.
translation.it: Hai causato un sacco di problemi, e normalmente quello è compito mio.

translation.en: Don't you understand?
The reason the Timekeepers leave me alone is 'cause I have boundaries.
translation.it: Il motivo per cui i guardiani del tempo mi lasciano in pace, è perché io ho dei limiti.

translation.en: I steal from my own people.
You surely know things are bad when I have to restore order.
translation.it: Sai che le cose sono messe male quando sta a me ristabilire l'ordine.

translation.en: Fortunately for you, I don't like to kill a man in cold blood.
translation.it: Fortunatamente per te, non mi piace uccidere un uomo a sangue freddo.

translation.en: I do it, but I prefer not to.
translation.it: Lo faccio, ma preferisco di no.

translation.en: I think you deserve a fighting chance.

translation.en: We play to zero.
What's the point?
I lose, I die. I win, they kill me.
translation.it: Se perdo, muoio. Se vinco, mi uccidono loro.

translation.en: If you don't fight, I'll kill you now.

translation.en: And her?
After I take you,
I'll take her.
Oh, yeah. And her time.
translation.it: Oh, sì, e il suo tempo.

translation.en: Then I'll collect my reward
for making everything right in the world.
translation.it: per aver ristabilito l'ordine nel mondo.

translation.en: This way!
All the time he's taken.

translation.en: Even to you?
I have given 50 years of my life to this job.
translation.it: Ho dedicato 50 anni della mia vita a questo lavoro.

translation.en: I am not about to see those years go to waste.

translation.en: Go on.
I'm sorry to be the one to break this to you,

translation.en: God damn it.
It's over.
We lost. We're not doing any good. At least we're trying.

translation.en: No. You don't understand. All they have to do is keep raising the cost of living.
translation.it: No. Non capisci. Devono solo continuare ad alzare il costo della vita.

translation.en: A hundred years. Two. A thousand. It does nothing.

translation.en: So, what? We just stop fighting?

translation.en: We can't win. We can't hurt them.

translation.en: The time we're taking makes no damn difference!

translation.en: What would? What would hurt them?
A million years. You got a million years on you?

translation.en: Let's give up.
Stop!
I am Sylvia Weis.
I want to surrender, but only to my father.

translation.en: Hello, Daddy.
Stay where you are!
You've hired more guards since I last saw you.

translation.en: Thanks to you, I need them. One too many.
translation.it: - Grazie a te, ne ho bisogno. - Una di troppo.

translation.en: Guns down.
Now!
Do it.
Let's go for a ride.
You'd steal from your own father.
Is it stealing if it's already stolen?

translation.en: What's the combination?
Well, it's not my birthday.

translation.en: You've started to regret that day, I imagine, Father.

translation.en: Darwin's birthday.
Survival of the fittest. (SCOFFS)
It cost us centuries just to bribe our way in here.

translation.en: Let's see what it got us.

translation.en: Quality time.
There really is a man with a million years.

translation.en: You know how much good it could do?
I know how much harm it could do.
Try to understand, even if you gave a year to a million people,

translation.en: you're just prolonging their agony. You're prolonging their lives.

translation.en: Let's hope so.
translation.it: - potrebbe inginocchiare il sistema. - Speriamo che sia così.

translation.en: We're not meant to live like this. We're not meant to live forever.

translation.en: Although I do wonder, Father, if you've ever lived a day in your life.
translation.it: Anche se mi chiedo, padre, se tu abbia mai vissuto un giorno nella tua vita.

translation.en: Is that so? You might upset the balance for a generation.
translation.it: È così? Potrai sbilanciare tutto per una generazione.

translation.en: Two.
But don't fool yourself. In the end, nothing will change.
translation.it: Ma non illuderti. Alla fine, non cambierà niente.

translation.en: Because everyone wants to live forever.
translation.it: Perché tutti vogliono vivere per sempre.

translation.en: They all think they have a chance at immortality

translation.it: anche se tutto dimostra il contrario.

translation.en: They all think they will be the exception.
But the truth is,

translation.en: No one should be immortal

What was that? What just happened?

Take a month, Maurice.
Dispatch, what can you see?

translation.en: You have a million years. You are definitely not in a hurry.

translation.en: If this works...
If this works, we gotta get more.

Wait. Never mind.
I have him.
Give the order, shoot on sight.

translation.en: COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one month. Please deposit one month.

translation.en: Keep going! Keep going! We're close!

translation.en: We're okay! We're okay!

translation.en: You're late.
Need a minute?
Go. Go.
Where's our capsule?
Too late.
Lost a lot of time, Mr. Leon.

translation.en: Looks like you're about out yourself.

translation.en: WOMAN: Time! MAN: There's time!
Move!
Move!
You, get out! Get out!
We gotta get to Livingston.
We can make it. Can we?

Stop!
You can run.
So can you.

Long time ago.

translation.en: That's the way it has to be.
I didn't start the clock.

translation.en: I can't turn it back.
I keep it running.

translation.en: I keep time.
"I keep time."
I'm gonna need some of that time you borrowed from me.

translation.en: Unless you want us to die on the way to our execution.

translation.en: Time.
We don't have enough.
One of us can make it. Take mine.

translation.en: You take mine. You can get there, I can't! I can't get there. You can.
translation.it: Tu prendi il mio. Tu puoi arrivare fin là. Io non posso. Non posso arrivarci. Tu sì.

translation.en: No. No. Yes!
translation.it: Tu prendi il mio. Tu puoi arrivare fin là. Io non posso. Non posso arrivarci. Tu sì. - No. No. - Sì.

translation.en: Please. No.
There's time.
What? The Keeper's time. Run. Run!
translation.it: - Cosa? - Il tempo del guardiano. Corri. Corri!

translation.en: Run!
I need time. COMPUTER VOICE: Time transfer.
translation.it: - Ho bisogno di tempo. - Trasferimento di tempo.

translation.en: What have we got?
A day.
Could do a lot in a day.

translation.en: Sir, do something.
It's already done.

translation.en: FEMALE ANCHOR: These are live pictures from Dayton.
Citizens have taken to the streets.

translation.en: There's so much stolen time in circulation.

translation.en: While authorities claim they have the situation

translation.en: under control, others fear the system may be headed for collapse.
translation.it: Anche se le autorità sostengono di avere la situazione sotto controllo, altri temono che il sistema sia sulla strada del collasso.

translation.en: We will continue to update you on this developing story.
translation.it: Continueremo ad aggiornarvi sugli sviluppi di questa storia.

translation.en: Sir, we lost Zone Eight. And Ten.

translation.en: It's spreading.
What do we do, sir?
Go home.
MALE ANCHOR: Still no sign of fugitives Will Salas and Sylvia Weis.
translation.it: Non c'è ancora traccia dei fuggitivi Will Salas e Sylvia Weis.

translation.en: Authorities continue to ask for the public's help
translation.it: Le autorità continuano a chiedere l'aiuto del pubblico

translation.en: in bringing these criminals to justice.
translation.it: per portare questi criminali alla giustizia.

translation.en: Told you there were bigger banks.
translation.it: Te l'avevo detto che c'erano banche più grandi.

translation.en: You almost missed your calling.
translation.it: Per poco non hai mancato la tua vocazione.
